basic.floral_language:
Red Fittonia verschaffeltii
Floriography: delicate, refreshing, vitality.
A small evergreen plant, leaves of the nerve plant are oval with white or red veins intercrossing like a web. Widely used indoor and micro-landscape for decoration.
The plant requires partial shade habitat. Two to three hours sunbath in winter is acceptable. Yellow flowers may bloom in September to November if growing well.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers in September-November, yellow flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like shade environments, in winter may take 2-3h sunlight
maintenance.watering: Need a lot of water, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
